akn:section.akn:heading: Development of model protocols for clinical care of infected individuals

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Requirement of provision of certain services

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Requirement of provision of certain services The Secretary may not make a grant under subsection (a) unless the applicant for the grant agrees that, with respect to patients participating in the project carried out with the grant, services provided pursuant to the grant will include—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Limitation on imposition of charges for services

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Limitation on imposition of charges for services The Secretary may not make a grant under subsection (a) unless the applicant for the grant agrees that, if the applicant will routinely impose a charge for providing services pursuant to the grant, the applicant will not impose the charge on any individual seeking such services who is unable to pay the charge.

(e) Authorization of appropriations For the purpose of carrying out this section, there are authorized to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary for each of the fiscal years 1989 through 1991, and such sums as may be necessary for each of the fiscal years 1994 through 1996.
